ameils24: Loey, this is something I've been thinking about for a long time. I notice that you, and other members of the plus sized community, have very slim faces, and prominent jaw lines. (@lateciat @theashleygraham & others) I am also plus sized, but do not have a very strong jawline, and I believe it would make me more confident if I did. Do you think that plus sized women with tight defined jaw lines are considered more beautiful, since that feature sort of 'clings to' the original ideal image of beauty that is mostly presented on runways, and magazines? I just feel like plus sized women who are blessed with a defined jawline are more easily accepted socially as beautiful, as opposed to a plus sized woman with a droopy jawline, or one that appears nonexistent. Let me know your thoughts on this. I've been curious to what you and others think for a long time. Thank you.
